story.title: #PumpkinsOnParade
story.description: Share your pumpkin photos with us and bring them to a display at the Museum on 31 October

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Carving a pumpkin this Halloween? Take a photo on Instagram or Flickr and share it under the hashtag #PumpkinsOnParade.

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: Carving a pumpkin this Halloween? Take a photo on Instagram or Flickr and share it under the hashtag #PumpkinsOnParade.

quote.text: Don't forget, you can also add your pumpkins to a special display on the Museum's colonnade, 31 Oct http://ow.ly/eqgKh #PumpkinsOnParade
